group_1.narration: Several days have passed since the inauguration@of the Historical Research Club.
Within the personal oasis we'd obtained,@we've been able to engross ourselves in what we enjoy@and spend a comfortable, relaxing time.
But I was still left with one concern...

group_1.textLeft: After all that... What *is* my magic, in the end?
Aren't you bothered by it too, Komachi?
We never did find out much about@Komachi-senpai's magic, either.

group_1.textRight: Yeah. But we'll learn something sooner or@later, right?
Conversely, I'm wondering why it's such a@concern to you, Kira.

group_1.textLeft: Wish-granting demons...@Cursed wish-granting objects...
Works that deal with such things are standard@in folklore, theatre, short stories, et cetera.
Komachi's wish came true right away,
And Mihono obtained a brand of magic that's very@easy to understand.
But in my case, because of the nature of my wish...
There's no way for it to come true without@publishing any works first.
And I still don't have a good grasp of my powers@as a Magical Girl.

group_1.textRight: You've got to have something in particular, right?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, undoubtedly...
But not knowing what that thing is has me--@how should I put it-- deeply unsatisfied?
It feels like I've been reading a novel, and@found the last page torn out...

group_1.textRight: In short, it feels gross!@In a literary sense.

group_1.textLeft: ...Indeed.
I feel like there should be some kind of@realization or suggestive passage...
...Some time soon, at least.
Yes.
As I previously mentioned...
I believe it's connected to words somehow, but...
I wouldn't say I'm eager to join. ...I get rather@anxious around new people, after all.
If possible, I'd ideally like to keep working@with just the three of us.
Komachi, I'm terribly sorry to bring this up so@suddenly, but...

group_1.textRight: Don't worry about it! All of your conversations@are sudden.[chara:303801:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:303801:cheek_0][chara:303801:motion_1][chara:303801:lipSynch_1]...So, what is it?

group_1.textLeft: Do you think we need a personal oasis?
Perhaps you have some kind of hunch?

group_1.textRight: Maybe. It kind of feels like we've been following@your words lately...
I'll bring it up again if I notice anything else.

group_1.textLeft: ...I see.
I thought you'd be likely to figure something out,@given your observational skills.

group_1.textRight: By the way, Kira-senpai.@What are you reading today?

group_1.textLeft: Huh? ...I've only been reading the complete works@of Ky≈çka for the last few days. What of it?
Yeah!@That's shocking in its own way.

group_1.textRight: See? You can never get a good read on what mode@she's in.

group_1.textLeft: It's quite interesting!
Mmm...
So now Mihono's started asking me about it, on@top of Komachi...

group_1.textCenter: 'Truth is stranger than fiction,' I suppose...?
